snippet: A federal judge ruled that the State Department must produce passenger manifests from 47 overseas trips Hillary Rodham Clinton made as secretary of state that were requested by Citizens United, the conservative advocacy group.
abstract: A federal judge ruled that the State Department must produce passenger manifests from 47 overseas trips Hillary Rodham Clinton made as secretary of state that were requested by Citizens United, the conservative advocacy group.

headline.main: Judge Orders State Dept. to Release Records From Clinton Trips
